courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Restricted to first-time freshman and transfer students.
description: Grand Challenge Learning course in the Inequality & Cultural Understanding pathway. Focuses on the historical dimensions of Inequality & Cultural Understanding from an interdisciplinary perspective and emphasizes experiential learning through projects, community-engaged scholarship, video conferences with experts and other collaborative classroom activities. Topics vary by section. Prerequisite: Restricted to first-time freshman and transfer students.
label: Historical Perspectives on Social Justice
sectionCappArea: Restricted to First Time Freshman or Transfer student - first time students.
sectionDegreeAttributes: Grand Challenge-Inequality, and Hist&Philosoph Perspect course.
